casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Mickey Gene MELLON No. 215P16 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 22, 2016 Mr. C. Scott Holmes, Attorney at Law, For Mellon, Mickey Gene. Ms. Elizabeth A. Fisher, Assistant Solicitor General, Mr. Mike Miller, District Attorney, for State.

ORDER

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 15th of June 2016 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Dissolved by order of the Court in conference, this the 22nd of September 2016."

Upon consideration of the petition filed by State of NC on the 15th of June 2016 for Writ of Supersedeas of the judgment of the Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

'Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 22nd of September 2016.'

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 15th of June 2016 by State of NC in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 22nd of September 2016."
